channel.title: U7 - Digital Environments on
channel.description: Recent content in U7 - Digital Environments on

item.description: Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 7.1.1 - Understand the features and characteristics of different types of physical computer system A personal computer Otherwise known PC, is a type of computer that is designed for personal use.

Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 7.2.1 - Understand the benefits and drawbacks of connecting devices to form networks Connecting devices to form networks, such as the Internet of Things (IoT), can have both benefits and drawbacks.

Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 7.3.1 Understand the key features of virtual environments: increased security Virtual environments are digital environments that are created and maintained using computer software.

Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 7.4.1 - Understand the concepts of cloud computing deployment Cloud computing is a model for delivering computing services and resources over the Internet.

Go back home: ⭐ Main ⭐ Finished / Incomplete 7.5.1 Understand the need to ensure digital environments are resilient, and the impact on organisations and stakeholders if this is not achieved Digital environments, such as computer systems, networks, and software applications, are critical to the operation and success of many organizations.
